text: Bold fashion statements rocked the red carpet tonight in Los Angeles at the 2018 BET Awards, where actors, musicians and other entertainers joined to celebrate outstanding achievement. To no one ’ s surprise, Janelle Monae led the style parade with a colorful arrival — clad in a floor - length ruffled rainbow gown with a train conductor - style hat. The always - dapper Ne - Yo didn ’ t play things safe with his look, either. The singer - songwriter had on a yellow suit teamed with silver Gucci sneakers Janelle Monae wearing a rainbow dress.
